    #include<iostream>
    #include<cstring>
    #define mod 10000
    using namespace std;

    int main()
    {
    long long dp[1009]={0};
    int l1;
    int t,n,i,j;
    dp[1]=1;
    dp[2]=1;
    for(i=3;i<=1001;i++)
    {
    j=1;
    while(i-j>=1)
    {
    dp[i]+=dp[i-j]*dp[j];
    dp[i]%=mod;
    j++;
    }
    dp[i]%=mod;

    }
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
    cin>>l1;
    cout<<dp[l1]<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
    }
